chapters.title: Chapter 17: Deceptions
chapters.info: Owyn Merrilin, p. 279 (245)—Thom's nephew. He could channel. He was found by the Red Ajah and gentled on the spot; this goes against the custom of taking the man to the Tower to be gentled, and then helping him to stay alive afterwards. Thom never forgave the Aes Sedai for their misdeed, and is almost willing to do anything to avenge Owyn's wrongful fate. See also Merrilin, Thomdril.
